price: 121. Esos (quienes sigan al Demonio) morarán en el Infierno y no encontrarán la manera de escapar de él.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنۡهَا مَحِيصٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhum jahannamu walā yajidūna ʿanhā maḥīṣan
